author: lindner
msg: Apply patch from Nik Haldimann for SHINDIG-95, apply hangman substitutions on screenshot
This appears to be an oversight in step 4 of the Gadgets spec:
v. Perform substitutions of each hangman expansion in the following fields:
a. Module.ModulePrefs@title, Module.ModulePrefs@title_url, Module.ModulePrefs@description, Module.Content@href, Module.Content
If this is the desired behavior (I'm guessing not, since we do want to i18n our images)
